tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Susheel is an excellent surgeon and an incredibly kind and friendly healthcare professional. I went to him with a boxer‚Äôs fracture on my right hand to seek a second opinion. Not only did he explain the injury and treatment in a detailed yet simple manner, he and his team also helped us with finding the most affordable way to get the procedure done. His team co ordinated with us throughout the surgery process, provides us guidance with insurance and most of the paperwork. I had two surgeries - a k wire implant and its subsequent removal 5 weeks later. And both of them went as smooth as it possibly could have been. His recommendation on diet and supplement medicines were well informed and I had a full recovery in less than two months. He always motivated and kept my spirits up during the scheduled consults. I would recommend him 10/10 for any orthopaedic issue you may be facing. Bless you, Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Fantastic approach in treating any relevant injuries. Personally i am happy the way he made me understand and finally treated by cervical spine problem.
 Currently undergoing my treatment for ankle sprain and his approach is very good in understanding the grade and issue with particular ligament stretched. Even found and helped my brother also in regards to his shoulder supraspinatus tear and very correctly suggested surgery. Sports injuries can be easily resolved under his guidance. Finally have patience for any ortho related problems , under  Dr.susheel Guidance and bit of sincerity in regards to rehab and his advice you will end the particular issue .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My repeat visit to this doctor was very disappointing. I saw Dr Susheel B for numbness of arm and he asked me to get MRI done from a diagnostic centre nearby. Unfortunately this diagnostic centre did not respond to my queries for an appointment despite multiple calls and follow ups. I eventually got an MRI done from another centre and saw the doctor with the films. Dr Susheel simply dismissed to see the films saying you have got it done from a low cost MRI and their films won't be good. 

I was surprised with this behaviour. How can a doctor comment about quality of films without even looking at it? Or was he perhaps upset that I didn't get MRI done from the centre he asked me to go to * *** ******* ******** Then he dismissed me saying come tomorrow with reports. I felt humiliated having spent time and money to get what the doctor asked me to and he just dismissed it! 

I eventually went to a reputed hospital and a reputed Ortho there * *** ******* *** *** ***** *** ******* *** ********** * ** ******* ****** **** * ***** **** ***** ***** ***** ******* ** *** *** ***** *** ** **** **** **** * **** ****** ** ******** *** ******** 

Do doctors like Susheel even understand the trouble a patient goes through in terms of time and money spent for the test? How can you just dismiss a patient just because he did not get MRI done at your preferred diagnostic centre? Doctors must understand that patient care includes behaving well with patient, understanding their issues and being empathetic.
reply_text:
Hello, if I have not mistaken the advice for MRI was given few weeks back & you turned up with only films. Had asked you to wait for one more day to analyse films with reports. I didn‚Äôt realise your trouble was so high after MRI, which was bearable for few weeks. 

Good to hear you got relief from other doctor similar to your kid who got cured when you got him to me few months back. 

Wish you speedy recovery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Please avoid this doctor ** **** ******** *****

I took doctor consultation online and he gave some vitamin tablets and then when i followed up as the condition was not getting better he asked to visit him in one of the hospitals.

He said he was suspecting Arthritis. So I was panicking and immediately booked an appointment. I arrived 15 mins earlier but thats on me. The doctor didnt arrive at the hospital for more than 40 mins later than the appointment.  **** *** *** *** ***** ***** *** **** **** ***** ******* ********** *** ***** It was a work day and i had taken an hour off from my work so I asked the attendant when would the doctor arrive. She handed the phone to me and said to ask myself. The doctor was rude on the phone and asked me to wait. I had already paid for the consultation so had no choice but to wait.

Once the doctor arrived he called my name in a very angry voice. He asked me about the problem and asked me to show the earlier analysis. I showed the online consultation and he immediately dismissed it saying that he doesnt believe in online consultation. What he didnt realise that it was his consultation only. He didnt even look at my hands and asked me to to a bunch of test which were for about 10K. He specifically asked me not to do anywhere else but in the hospital as he doesnt trusts other hospitals. I was shocked and asked him if he didnt even look at my hand why did he call me for an in person checkup. He again got angry and asked me to do what he says.

I went to another hospital *** *** ***** **** ** **** **** ** *** ******* **** *** ** *** I will never visit this doctor or RxDx again. **** *** ** ********* *** **** ********* *** **** **** ********** You will have no option but to do what they say you are worried about you health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Color bone fractured due to bike accident. Initially concluded a surgery is required. Susheel sir suggested we will conclude that only after 15 days. Sir started treatment and after 1 week we saw good progress of healing and suggested to continue the same spirit to avoid surgery. Strictly followed Dr. Susheel sir instructions and 3 week visit sir concluded surgery is not required. Suggested to come after 3 weeks and do the suggested exercises.51 day visited with new xray and it's completely heeled and in good form. His instructions is very good and clear. Thankyou sir for all your treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We visited for my moms shoulder pain which she had after carrying a bag on shoulder .. As it is from few days.. We had waited for 30 mins as he was late and after he came he was in hurry.. Instead of making the patient comfortable and confident,  he was explain the interim among thr..  I got mom here bcoz she was worried as its thr from 4 days or so and so to make her feel confident that nothing major.. But he scared her saying take 7 to 10 days physio and thn if still pain thr thn will go for MR scan  we will wait and check,..  even after requesting him he was like thts wht I told (headbang).. And while leaving he told he will check physio machine availability, as we were waiting he went to have discussion with medical rep who were waiting.. Bad experience..  Tht too rs 450 for such a hurry consultation.. Planning to go to different Dr.
reply_text:
Patience is the key for any patient, especially for Orthopaedic problems. 
Expecting few day old problem without any medical attention or rest, to settle just by counselling doesnt help. 
Doctors work with humans not with machines to shut down n maintain time. No doctor will ask you to get out of the room after 10mis, which is time alloted for consultation.
So be patient and go with enough time whoever you visiting next. 
All the best & follow the advice at the earliest

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Scores 5/5 in trust factor - which is a rarity in today's fast world. This after having visited multiple times over the past decade for various illness (slip disc, facture, knee ACL ligament tear, Shoulder collar bone fracture......) of my family members.

Patiently listens to entire history. 
Explains the medical situation in layman language for patient to understand.
Shares all options as well as pros/cons per each option and also gives space for you to choose. Not knife happy. Does not push for surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am overwhelmed with the process and approach used by Dr. Susheel to do total knee replacement for both knees of my mother.Everything had happened as per his plan.It almost a month,and my mother have started practicing rigourous exercises like climbing stairs.I have had very good experience with Dr. Susheel as he only prescribed me medicine if required otherwise he always encouraged me to go for exercises.What can I say! I am extremely satisfied.It was long time due post.I wanted to do it.Thank you Dr Susheel for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went with a TFCC tear wrist ligament injury. The doctor explained the issue perfectly and also the right treatment journey he was putting me on. I followed all his words dedicatedly and now I have recovered and I am able to lift weights, ride freely and everything else easily. He never gave unnecessary medicines and alwayd focused on making me do the right rehab. Thanks a lot sir.

After that too , he didnt explain me the reason for the problem after seeing the x-ray reports , or the recovery time and uttered some layman terms and walked out of the clinic in a rush . I dont have any positives to share .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Doctor patiently explain the problem and the treatment he is suggesting. Extremely happy and I would recommend to my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother has multiple diabetic complications and top of it she got injured and her hip joint fractured. Consulted Dr. Susheel and he explained the problem in detail with pros and cons with hip replacement surgery. Really appreciate his advice and consultation and the time and attention towards the patient. He did the surgery, which went very well. Thanks a lot to Dr. Susheel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very friendly and explained the issue clearly. i have visited him for my football injury in my right ankle. overall good. Suggestions from side is.. it would be good if the doctor spend little more time to explain how to recover , diet tips and some motivation.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I went for an ankle sprain treatment happened due to twist while playing, * *** ****** ******** ******* * *** ********** **** * **** **** ** **** * ******** **** *** ********* **** after X ray report no bone injury was detected ***** he suggested to go for 3 weeks plaster. I asked for alternatives like a brace & bed rest for 3 weeks at home but he did not showed interest. I asked to please provide me with a bed rest certificate so that I can WFH atleast for a month or so to which he denied saying that I am not treating you so I can't write for a bed rest. I paid for the consultation & xray ***** *** *********** still I couldn't even get  bed rest note, just a blank prescription sheet. Please be ****** ************ * considerate towards patient's request, it wasn't an unreasonable request.
reply_text:
You walked with a limp after a twisting injury of ankle more than one week old. According to me you have a ligament injury, which required medical attention more than one week back & required immobilisation. which your medical knowledge says NO. Asked you to take some medication. Again your wisdom said medication are not required. Then I asked you to take rest, make up your mind which way you want to get treated & come back. You asked for certificate for bed rest, which I denied as you are not taking any active medical treatment. I clearly told, I can‚Äôt as I believe it won‚Äôt heal with staying at home. Asked you to do MRI if you are in doubt, which was also not acceptable for you. 
If you would have told in reception that you are looking for a medical certificate, they would have not entertained you at all. By doing that you would have allowed patients who we‚Äôre waiting to get treated some more earlier space. Kindly take out from your mind that you have paid, so you are entitled to your views. It‚Äôs treating doctors decision to do best for his patients. Instead of wasting time expressing your frustration here, which is of minuscule significance , go ahead & get yourself treated before it becomes too late. All the best for your ankle.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Terrible experience with Dr Susheel: Please do NOT go to this Dr. I went to Dr. Susheel with neck pain and he suggested to do an mri and insisted in doing it at prima diagnostics. He said he will call the technician and explain exactly what part mri etc is needed and he fid that. I  immediately got it done and went back to the doctor with the report.  He said that some parts of the report were missing and he called the lab and asked them to send the details. The lab and the doctor became unresponsive after that despite repeated calls.  So I showed another orthopedic *** **** **** *** ** **** ** ***** **** ******* ** *********** ** **** **** ** *** ** *** ******* ******* *** ***** *** ***** * ***** **** ******* **** ** ******* *** ** **** ** ** ***** **** ***** *** ** *** ** *** **** *** *** ******** ******** *** **** ** ** ******* ********* ***** *** **** delayed my diagnosis causing much pain and suffering.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: He is also available at mfine, I booked an appointment and after listening all about my medical history He advised to come to hospital, I reached there on time but he was late or busy I don't know but I wat there more than 30 minutes this is also fine but the receptionist ask me for 600 rs then I asked why I already paid at mfine this can also be fine but then Doctor told me I did not called you to see your face very roudly. I feel insulated. I did not give any prescription and advised to go for a scan. it was all happened in not more than 5 minutes I feel like I did not pay again so doc was not happy.I feel this is not the right guy for my treatment so come back home.Just a humble request so show some empathy to patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
First would like to thank Dr. Susheel B . for  curing my Osteoporosis and joints pain which i sufered for 3 years. Visit multiple Doctors in 3 years but my pain was not cured. Dr. Susheel B  treated my problems very systematically with in two visits and he Recommended  Gemtide injection for my Osteoporosis  with  Dr Susheel .treatment am free of all problems. Recomend all patients like me to visit his clinic.
He has shared the effect of this GemTide.As he reviewed with X-ray.The process of solidification how it works.
I m thankful to Gem Tide representative who rendered Best services.
My Mrs now doing well and relieved from pain and doing routine work as normal way.üëçüëç

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor is ok..listened to health complaints attentively and suggested relevant tests to diagnose... but waiting time is more..for follow up checkup for showing reports,  in spite of having a confirmed appointment I have waited 2.5 hours for my consultation to be done..those who came after me, appointments after me and even walkin patients were seen first by doctor though my appointment slot was 2nd or 3rd..and I was on time for my appointment...in my opinion the order of appointment has to be followed unless its a medical emergency which was not the case that day..my follow up consult was done in just 10 min without confirmed diagnosis or explanation..waiting time and consultation times need to be improved  drastically...in my opinion long waiting times lead to negative feedbacks about the doc.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was facing right leg Ankle pain since a year, i met Doctor Susheel as one of my relative referred me. He gave much time and asked me the history of my ankle pain, referred some tests and now i'm undergoing treatment as per his suggestion and based on his concern, response for his patients i have complete hopes on him that my ankle pain gets off soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Susheel has helmed 2 major knee surgeries for me - Arthroscopy and ACL Reconstruction over a period of few years and during those tough situations, we were always in a positive mood mainly because of his encouragement and detailed explanations.
My parents also have taken lot of medical advice from Dr Susheel which were not just Ortho related but general medical advice too. Over the period of 5 years, Dr Susheel has become our go to family doctor for any kind of medical advice/consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My sister had knee pain and Dr gave Aceclofenac medicine along with other medicine. *** *********** ****** **** **** ********* ** ********* ** ******* *** **** **** **** ******** *** ***** ******* ** ******* ** **** ** ** ******* * **** ** ****** ******** ****** ** ***** One month later I visited Dr and told whole story and suggested him not to recommend this medicine. Instead of appreciating, he was defensive. Another problem is that he gives his own medicine, which you can't find anywhere.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** **** ****** ****** * *** ***** * ***** ***** ******** * **** ** ************** Dr was very quick in consultation, so the appointment time was not more than 10 minutes. I am not satisfied with the hastiness and unprofessional suggestions which includes physiotherapist too. ***** ********
